org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: Error-PharmacyFormsWithoutRegimenLineOrRegimen
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Pharmacy forms without Regimen Line or Regimen
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery: select obs.person_id, pid1.identifier as PepfarID, pid2.identifier as HospID, form.name as PMMForm, encounter.encounter_datetime as VisitDate, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165708,cn1.name,null)) as RegimenLine, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164506,cn1.name,null)) as Adult1stLineRegimens, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164513,cn1.name,null)) as Adult2ndLineRegimens, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165702,cn1.name,null)) as Adult3rdLineRegimens, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164507,cn1.name,null)) as Child1stLineRegimens, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164514,cn1.name,null)) as Child2ndLineRegimens, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164703,cn1.name,null)) as Child3rdLineRegimens from obs LEFT join patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=obs.person_id and pid1.identifier_type=4 and pid1.voided=0) LEFT join patient_identifier pid2 on(pid2.patient_id=obs.person_id and pid2.identifier_type=5 and pid2.voided=0) INNER JOIN encounter on(encounter.encounter_id=obs.encounter_id and encounter.voided=0 and encounter.form_id=27) LEFT JOIN form on(encounter.form_id=form.form_id and encounter.voided=0) left join concept_name cn1 on(obs.value_coded=cn1.concept_id and cn1.locale='en' and cn1.locale_preferred=1) WHERE encounter.encounter_datetime BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate and encounter.voided=0 GROUP BY encounter.patient_id, encounter.encounter_id HAVING MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165708,cn1.name,null)) IS NULL OR ( MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164506,cn1.name,null)) IS NULL AND MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164513,cn1.name,null)) IS NULL AND MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165702,cn1.name,null)) IS NULL AND MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164507,cn1.name,null)) IS NULL AND MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164514,cn1.name,null)) IS NULL AND MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164703,cn1.name,null)) IS NULL );
